DOC.brief_title: X-MAS Biliary Study With Covered Biliary Stent
DOC.detailed_description: This non-randomized , multi-center , prospective , single arm clinical study X-Suit NIR® Covered Biliary Metallic Stent palliation malignant strictures biliary tree via endoscopic approach . Adult male female ( ≥ 18 year old ) , clinical symptom biliary obstruction inoperable extrahepatic biliary obstruction malignant process . The expected duration study approximately 18 month time first subject enrollment time last subject 's 6-month post stent implantation follow-up visit .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 old . 2 . Clinical symptom biliary obstruction . 3 . Presence inoperable extrahepatic distal biliary obstruction malignant process ( subject surgical candidate base find pancreatic mass > 2.0cm severe medical illness ) . 4 . Subject willing able comply study procedure provide write informed consent participate study . 5 . Insured Social Security ( applicable subject screen France ) . 1 . Participation Investigational Study within 90 day prior date subject consent . 2 . Perforation duct within biliary tree . 3 . Presence one previously implant plastic stent . 4 . Previous plastic stent implantation le 2 week prior current procedure . 5 . Presence metal biliary stent . 6 . Presence esophageal duodenal stent . 7 . Previous Bilroth II RouxenY gastric resection , significant duodenal obstruction alter anatomy could prevent access ampulla . 8 . Subjects endoscopic procedure contraindicate . 9 . Subjects know sensitivity component stent delivery system . 10 . Subjects active hepatitis hepatic disease may cause jaundice . 11 . Subjects WHO performance score 4 Bedbound ( completely disable , carry selfcare , totally confine bed chair ) . 12 . Subjects know pregnant . Cholangiographic exclusion criterion : 13 . Strictures pass guide wire delivery system .
